Changelog
---------

<!-- Do not edit. This file is automatically generated from changelog.toml.-->

**0.20.0 (2026-01-30)**

* Add modal screen for displaying hashtag details
* Implement following/featuring hashtags
* Gallery screen improvements
* Add `--image-type` option for overriding how images are rendered

**0.19.0 (2026-01-27)**

* Implement translating statuses (shortcut: capital T)
* Implement bookmarking statuses (shortcut: capital B)
* Add bookmarks timeline

**0.18.2 (2026-01-25)**

* Fix a bug where multiple menu items with the same code would cause a crash
  (#71)

**0.18.1 (2026-01-25)**

* Fix a breaking bug

**0.18.0 (2026-01-25)**

* Add ? shortcut to show key bindings
* Add confirmation dialog when closing draft status (#70)
* Allow setting language when posting (#69)
* Don't allow editing post visibility since it's immutable

**0.17.1 (2026-01-08)**

* Fix threads not showing for boosted statuses (#68)
* Fix status context menu not working (#67)
* Reorganise and cleanup a bunch of code

**0.17.0 (2026-01-04)**

* Add showing account timeline (thanks Bastian Greshake Tzovaras)
* Improved account screen, display as modal, show shortcuts
* Show user preferences on instance screen
* Fix issue where all status bars would share content

**0.16.3 (2026-01-03)**

* Show quoted toots in notifications
* Fix issue with nullable fields (#64)

**0.16.2 (2026-01-02)**

* Improved error reporting

**0.16.1 (2026-01-02)**

* Fix error when application is added on account screen (#63)

**0.16.0 (2026-01-01)**

* Implement account selection screen, no longer uses toot's auth data
* Implement account switching via command pallete (ctrl+p)
* Move image viewer setting to --image-viewer commandline option
* Various under-the-hood improvements

**0.15.1 (2025-11-30)**

* Show image description in gallery
* Fix a bug where an error is shown when there are no more statuses in the
  timeline

**0.15.0 (2025-11-28)**

* Add an internal image gallery for viewing enlarged images (shortuct: m), used
  when no image_viewer is configured
* Better status bar, can show multiple messages and supports clearing messages
  individually.
* Don't block while loading timelines, add loading indicator
* Improved error modal

**0.14.0 (2025-11-25)**

* **BREAKING**: Requires Python 3.11
* Display images using textual-image (supports kitty, sixel, halfblock)
* Use textual-fspicker for attaching media files
* Show user avatar on account screen
* Many minor improvements

**0.10.0 (2024-02-10)**

* Add `--version` option
* Update timeline list and detail when status is boosted/favourited
* Show blurhash placeholder while loading images
